channel.title: Any way to get a moving fire cape in testscape?
channel.description:
is it possible to get a moving fire cape in testscape? and also change the gfx?
ive seen it work in other sources .. but i like testscape the best =\

item.title: Any way to get a moving fire cape in testscape?
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

You can’t…

You can de-compile them but can;t open them…

So get a client that has java files already there…

Read full topic
